name: Pokka Jasmine Green Tea
description: Pokka Jasmine Green Tea is brewed with carefully selected premium tea leaves, contains no preservatives and with 25% lower sugar level.

name: Pokka Lemon Tea
description: Pokka Lemon Tea is a refreshing blend of authentic premium black tea with real lemon juice. This delicious thirst-quencher contains Vitamin C and natural antioxidants. Experience this delightful citrus blend today!

name: Pokka No Sugar Oolong Tea
description: Pokka No Sugar Oolong Tea is real brewed with selected premium tea leaves and contains absolutely no sugar, preservatives, or coloring, offering you ultimate healthy enjoyment. Indulge in its refreshing harmony every day!
related: Pokka No Sugar Oolong Tea, Pokka Lemon Tea

name: F&N Seasons Barley Drink
description: F&N Seasons Barley Drink is made from selected barley that is brewed and lightly sweetened for a drink that is as familiar and comforting as that prepared by your mum. When the weather heats up, trust barley water to cool you down. Made with a reduced sugar recipe, it is also certified a 'Healthier Choice' beverage.

name: Yeo's Lychee Drink
description: Yeo's Lychee Drink is the perfect drink for seasonal fruit lovers in Asia. Enjoy the delicately sweet luscious taste of lychee all year round. Drink it chilled, over crushed ice, or simply try mixing it in your cocktails!

name: F&N Seasons Ice Peach Tea
description: F&N Seasons Ice Peach Tea is a delectable combination of peach and tea brewed from real tea leaves. Quench your thirst and take a break from the hustle and bustle - one whiff and you'll be transported to a far away breezy summer day in a land full of ripening peach trees.
related: Pokka Lemon Tea,Pokka No Sugar Oolong Tea

name: Pokka Premium Milk Coffee
description: Pokka Premium Milk Coffee is made from specially selected gourmet coffee beans and high quality milk. Its rich taste and luscious coffee aroma linger on to delight the taste buds. This drink is real brewed for coffee aficionados and those who seek, enjoy and appreciate the highest quality and best taste. Come and indulge in the smooth and sensational taste today! With no added preservatives or coloring.
related: Starbucks Frappuccino Mocha Chilled Coffee Drink

name: Starbucks Frappuccino Mocha Chilled Coffee Drink
description: A satisfying and smooth blend of Starbucks Coffee with creamy milk and rich chocolate taste; low fat

name: Ferrero Rocher Chocolate T16
description: Crisp milk chocolate & hazelnut shells with a rich, smooth chocolate filling; elegant and delightful

name: Ferrero Rocher Chocolate T24
description: Crisp milk chocolate & hazelnut shells with a rich, smooth chocolate filling; elegant and delightful

name: Sun-Maid Natural California Raisins
description: Sun-Maid Natural California Raisins are a 100% natural, delicious and sweet way to get more fruit into your diet!

name: Tai Sun Roasted Cashew Nuts
description: Tai Sun Roasted Cashew Nuts are mildly sweet and irresistibly crunchy. They are full of nutritional compounds, antioxidants and minerals, and are also trans fat and cholesterol free.

name: Pasar Baby Kailan
description: Irresistably green and leafy, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!
related: Sun-Maid Natural California Raisins, Tai Sun Roasted Cashew Nuts

name: Porkeee Frozen Lean Pork
description: Irresistably red and meaty, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!
related: Frangosul Frozen Chicken Boneless Leg Meat

name: Frangosul Frozen Chicken Boneless Leg Meat
description: Irresistably white and birdy, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!

name: Frangosul Frozen Beef Ribeye
description: Irresistably red and round, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!
related: Frangosul Frozen Chicken Boneless Leg Meat

name: Frangosul Frozen Leg of Lamb
description: Irresistably leg and lamby, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!
related: Frangosul Frozen Chicken Boneless Leg Meat

name: Settler Smoked Salmon
description: Irresistably red and swimmy, perfect for hot soups and cloudy weather!
related: Frangosul Frozen Chicken Boneless Leg Meat

name: Royal Umbrella Fragrant Rice
description: Royal Umbrella Fragrant Rice is made of only the highest quality 100% whole kernel Thai Hom Mali rice. With a perfect mix of fertile soil, climate and rice growing technology, Royal Umbrella's jasmine rice beats the taste test of the most discerning rice lovers the world over and was crowned 'Best Rice' at the 2009 World Rice Conference.

name: Junior Fine Grain Wholemeal Bread
description: Start your day by replacing a slice or two of your white bread with Fine Grain Wholemeal Bread for a more balanced and healthy diet!

name: Jumbo 600 Enriched White Bread
description: Baked from high protein flour and enriched with vitamins and minerals.

name: Kellogg's Special K Cereal
description: Kellogg's Special K Cereal is made from delicious, light crisp flakes of rice and wheat. It has a low GI (glycemic index), is 99% fat free, and is a good source of protein, which is essential for a balanced diet. Start your day the Special K way - it's that simple!

name: McVities Original Digestives
description: The McVitie’s Digestive is a delicious wheat biscuit made using the traditional recipe (our secret to that same great taste!). This has been the case since the very first McVitie's Digestive was made in 1892.

name: White Rabbit Creamy Candy
description: Each candy is wrapped in a printed waxed paper wrapper, but within this, the sticky candies are again wrapped in a thin edible paper-like wrapping made from sticky rice.

name: Kraft Cheddar Cheese
description: Creamy and sliced, best thing since brown bread!

name: KerryGold Pure Irish Butter
description: Pure, Irish, and Butter! What's there not to like!

name: Dannon Greek nonfat Yoghurt
description: Nonfat for health and happiness!

name: Welch Grape Juice
description: Purple and grapey, good for taking out skunks as well!

name: F&N Groovy Grape
description: Purple and grapey, good for taking out skunks as well!

name: Somersby Apple Cider
description: Apples for everyone!
